snippet.title: Bomb Buddies - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Here's your look at the trailer for Bomb Buddies, an upcoming augmented reality (AR), cooperative mobile puzzle game. Bomb Buddies was revealed during the Advanced Games Projects (AGP) Spotlight Show at USC Games Expo 2023.

In Bomb Buddies, solve puzzles, crack codes, and test your dexterity with a friend...but watch out! Everything is not as it seems when a nefarious hacker gets involved. When the stakes are high can your skills still hold up to the test?
